title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Davante Adams Trade, Kaepernick Comeback, Russ/Pete Blame, Hurts Philly Future, Colts QB Void
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Davante Adams Trade, Kaepernick Comeback, Russ/Pete Blame, Hurts Philly Future, Colts QB Void
description:
John answers listener questions in his weekend Mailbag, including if the Davante Adams trade gives the Raiders a shot to win the brutal AFC West, if it's time to slam the door on Colin Kaepernick's NFL comeback chances, the biggest factor in the decline of NBA ratings, if Philly should consider building around Jalen Hurts, when Colts fans should start being freaked out about their long term QB plan, and why Kirk Cousins keeps getting paid.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
